title: Chocolate fudge beetroot cake
ingredients: ['250g good-quality dark chocolate', '3 medium eggs', '250g light muscovado sugar', '1 vanilla pod, cut in half lengthways and seeds scraped out', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 tablespoons honey', '40g self-raising flour', '40g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '25g cocoa powder', '50g ground almonds', '250g raw beetroot, peeled and finely grated', '100ml strong black coffee', '30ml sunflower oil', 'For the icing', '150g good-quality dark chocolate', '3 tablespoons strong black coffee', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons honey']
